00046 template <typename T>
00047     class block_allocator
00048     {
00049         typedef T                       element_type;
00050

00068         template <typename U>
00069             block_allocator(const block_allocator<U> &) throw() {}
00070 
00071         ~block_allocator() throw()                                {}
00072         pointer address(reference x) const                          { return & x; }
00073         const_pointer address(const_reference x) const              { return & x; }
00074 
00075         size_type max_size() const throw()
00076         {
00077             return size_t(-1) / sizeof(T);
00078         }
00079 
00080         pointer allocate(size_type s, const void * = 0)
00081         {
00082             //value_type * p = (value_type *) value_type::operator new(sizeof(value_type));
00083             value_type * p = new value_type();
00084 
00085             return p->element();
00086         }

00089         {
00090             //::new (p) owned_base;
00091             //::new (p->element()) T(x);
00092         }
00093 
00094         void destroy(pointer p)
00095         {
00096             p->reset();
00097         }
00098

00100         {
00101         }
